s1.name: ObjectWeb Source Forge tools
s1.p: The JavaService software is supported through the use of the community tools at the ObjectWeb Forge for this project. As an open source project, external contributions are welcomed as a means to improving and extending the software capability and usability.
If you require support, the best way to find a solution is to browse the forums and if needed, enter your own question.
If you have need of a new feature that is not implemented within the current version of JavaService, you can also suggest this as an enhancement or new development.
The project forums are available here and the mailing list can be accessed here for any issues related to JavaService.
